TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Nepal, title = Nepal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nepal} }

S.FORM: Nepal hya' ga cyux maki' tay 28 00 N, 84 00 E na Aziya' syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 147,181 sq km (maki' tay 94ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 143,351 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 3,830 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 29,033,914. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 28.80% , lhlahuy hya' ga 25.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 45.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Kathmandu. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 28 na tay ymagal byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Bidhya Devi Bhandari, aring ryax 29 squ byacing tay 10 sa kawas 2015 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. Nepal cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Nepal hya' ga cyox maki' tay 28 00 N, 84 00 E na Aziya' syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 147,181 sq km (maki' tay 94ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 143,351 sq km, kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 3,830 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 29,033,914. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 28.80% , lhlahoy hya' ga 25.40%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 45.80%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Kathmando. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 28 na tay ymagal byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Bidhya Devi Bhandari, aring ryax 29 sqo byacing tay 10 sa kawas 2015 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. Nepal cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
